channel.title: Leaning Tower of Pisa on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Leaning Tower of Pisa on Memo Tut

item.title: Vertical Tower of Pisa using OpenCV ～Vertical Tower of Pisa～
item.description: #Overview Recently, I learned image processing in a class and learned the technique of transforming a plane by matrix transformation. Then I suddenly got an urge to make the Leaning Tower of Pisa vertical, so I’ll try to practice Python and OpenCV. Well, I don’t understand much, so I’m good at using OpenCV useful functions. Let’s Vertical! #environment windows10 Python 3.7.7 OpenCV 3.4.2 Pillow 7.1.2 numpy 1.18.4 #Implementation Click here for the Leaning Tower of Pisa Since white is strong as a whole, this time try to detect the contour not by the edge but by the color tone.
